publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1666 Keith Brown: World Cross Country Championships—That the Parliament recognises the success of the International Association of Athletics Federation’s 36th World Cross Country Championships held in Scotland on 30 March 2008; believes that this reflects well on Scottish Athletics, the many volunteers and participants involved, and the country as a whole, and extends its congratulations to all those responsible for further highlighting Scotland’s professionalism and ability to host international sporting events to the wider world. Supported by: Bill Kidd*, Bashir Ahmad*, Jamie McGrigor*, Nanette Milne*, Hugh O’Donnell*, Shirley-Anne Somerville*, Jamie Stone*, Kenneth Gibson*, Roseanna Cunningham*, John Lamont*, Brian Adam*, Stuart McMillan*, Mike Pringle*, Jamie Hepburn*, Joe FitzPatrick*
S3M-1666 World Cross Country Championships (lodged on 1 April 2008) Robin Harper*
S3M-1666 World Cross Country Championships (lodged on 1 April 2008) Gil Paterson*
S3M-1666 World Cross Country Championships (lodged on 1 April 2008) Willie Coffey*
S3M-1666 World Cross Country Championships (lodged on 1 April 2008) Jack McConnell*
